entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
